pages.text: About Me~ TODO ~ TODO ~ TODO ~ TODO ~ TODO const cors = 'https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/';   Github activities const githubUrl = 'https://github-contributions-api.herokuapp.com/kjs927/count'; axios.get(`${cors}${githubUrl}`, { crossDomain: true }).then(res => { var dataList = new Array(); var ydata = res.data.data; for(let y in ydata) { var mdata = ydata[y]; for(let m in mdata) { var ddata = mdata[m]; for(let d in ddata) { dataList.push({"date": new Date(y, m - 1, d), "count": ddata[d]}); } } } var yearago = new Date(new Date().setFullYear(new Date().getFullYear() - 1)); yearago.setMonth(yearago.getMonth()); var chart = calendarHeatmap() .data(dataList) .selector('#github-cal-heatmap') .startDate(yearago) .colorRange(['#dae289', '#3b6427']) .tooltipEnabled(true) .legendEnabled(true) .onClick(function (data) { console.log('onClick callback. Data:', data); }); chart(); }).catch(error => { console.log('error', error); }) Leetcode activities const lcUrl = 'https://leetcode.com/api/user_submission_calendar/kjs927/'; axios.get(`${cors}${lcUrl}`, { crossDomain: true }).then(res => { var dataList = new Array(); // *********************************** // ** success => process data ** // *********************************** var chartData = res.data; chartData = chartData.toString(); chartData = chartData.replace('{', ''); chartData = chartData.replace('}', ''); chartData = chartData.replace(/(?:\\[rn]|[\r\n]+)+/g, ""); //console.log(data); chartData = chartData.split(','); for (var i = 0; i < chartData.length; i++) { var d = chartData[i].split(':'); var s = {"date": new Date(parseInt(d[0].replace(/[^0-9]/g, ''))*1000), "count": parseInt(d[1])}; dataList.push(s); } // *********************************** // ** render chart ** // *********************************** var yearago = new Date(new Date().setFullYear(new Date().getFullYear() - 1)); yearago.setMonth(yearago.getMonth()); var chart = calendarHeatmap() .data(dataList) .selector('#leetcode-cal-heatmap') .startDate(yearago) .colorRange(['#dae289', '#3b6427']) .tooltipEnabled(true) .legendEnabled(true) .onClick(function (data) { console.log('onClick callback. Data:', data); }); chart(); }).catch(error => { console.log('error', error); }) OtherSpecial thanks Icarus and 辣椒の酱 for blog templates.

posts.title: Awesome Roadmaps
posts.text: A curated list of awesome software development roadmaps from Awesome Roadmaps.  Go Developer Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/Fkxho3U.png  Web Developer Fundamental https://i.imgur.com/cyYgB35.png Front-End https://i.imgur.com/maAXepz.png Back-End https://i.imgur.com/2b1bC59.png DevOps https://i.imgur.com/nLUWgNY.png  Node.js Developer Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/QYC6qX8.png  .Net back-end Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/keHU3wb.png  ASP.NET Core Developer Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/bpwc6qD.png)  React Developer Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/dohrVAz.png  Vue Developer Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/n8RDeCm.png  Angular Developer Roadmap Fundamental https://i.imgur.com/XCHPJ90.png HTML5 Front-end Developer https://i.imgur.com/9PzLmV0.png UI Front-end Developer https://i.imgur.com/J30Y9WT.png JS Front-end Developer https://i.imgur.com/Xo5UEP4.png  UI/UX Designer Roadmap Fundamental https://i.imgur.com/im4DE00.png UI Design Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/AdcemaB.png UX Design Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/qs02z49.png  Game Developer Roadmap Fundamental https://i.imgur.com/CIPoYEy.png Game Client Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/a8HZU6D.png Game Server Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/YSaWWBQ.png Game Tester Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/e8lEBm3.png  Mobile Developer Roadmap Fundamental https://i.imgur.com/tOFs37N.png iOS Developer Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/HEqVq8T.png https://i.imgur.com/2LCQ5n1.png  Swift Developer Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/uZLiBrf.png  Android Developer Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/XaIAHcC.png  Data Scientist Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/tgLJFWV.png  Software Architect Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/Lxj6xkn.png  Software Quality Assurance Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/6gbsee2.png  Deep Learning Papers Reading Roadmap  Hacker Roadmap  Coding Interview University   [Reference] Awesome Roadmapshttps://github.com/orsanawwad/awesome-roadmaps

posts.title: Online Markdown Editor
posts.text: https://pandao.github.io/editor.md/en.html https://dillinger.io/ https://stackedit.io/app Sample (from Editor.md)Features Support Standard Markdown / CommonMark and GFM(GitHub Flavored Markdown); Full-featured: Real-time Preview, Image (cross-domain) upload, Preformatted text/Code blocks/Tables insert, Code fold, Search replace, Read only, Themes, Multi-languages, L18n, HTML entities, Code syntax highlighting…; Markdown Extras : Support ToC (Table of Contents), Emoji, Task lists, @Links…; Compatible with all major browsers (IE8+), compatible Zepto.js and iPad; Support identification, interpretation, fliter of the HTML tags; Support TeX (LaTeX expressions, Based on KaTeX), Flowchart and Sequence Diagram of Markdown extended syntax; Support AMD/CMD (Require.js & Sea.js) Module Loader, and Custom/define editor plugins; Editor.md ##Headers (Underline) H1 Header (Underline)H2 Header (Underline)Characters Strikethrough Strikethrough (when enable html tag decode.)Italic ItalicEmphasis EmphasisEmphasis Italic Emphasis Italic Superscript: X2，Subscript: O2 Abbreviation(link HTML abbr tag) The HTML specification is maintained by the W3C. Blockquotes Blockquotes Paragraphs and Line Breaks “Blockquotes Blockquotes”, Link。 LinksLinks Links with title <link> : https://github.com Reference link GFM a-tail link @pandao Code Blocks (multi-language) & highlightingInline code$ npm install marked Code Blocks (Indented style)Indented 4 spaces, like <pre> (Preformatted Text). <?php echo "Hello world!"; ?>Code Blocks (Preformatted text): | First Header | Second Header | | ------------- | ------------- | | Content Cell | Content Cell | | Content Cell | Content Cell |Javascript 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536function test(){ console.log("Hello world!");} (function(){ var box = function(){ return box.fn.init(); }; box.prototype = box.fn = { init : function(){ console.log('box.init()'); return this; }, add : function(str){ alert("add", str); return this; }, remove : function(str){ alert("remove", str); return this; } }; box.fn.init.prototype = box.fn; window.box =box;})();var testBox = box();testBox.add("jQuery").remove("jQuery"); HTML code12345678910<!DOCTYPE html><html> <head> <mate charest="utf-8" /> <title>Hello world!</title> </head> <body> <h1>Hello world!</h1> </body></html> ImagesImage: Follow your heart. 图为：厦门白城沙滩 Xiamen 图片加链接 (Image + Link)： 图为：李健首张专辑《似水流年》封面 ListsUnordered list (-) Item A Item B Item C Unordered list (*) Item A Item B Item C Unordered list (plus sign and nested) Item A Item B Item B 1 Item B 2 Item B 3 Item C Item C 1 Item C 2 Item C 3 Ordered list Item A Item B Item C Tables First Header Second Header Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell First Header Second Header Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell Function name Description help() Display the help window. destroy() Destroy your computer! Item Value Computer $1600 Phone $12 Pipe $1 Left-Aligned Center Aligned Right Aligned col 3 is some wordy text $1600 col 2 is centered $12 zebra stripes are neat $1 HTML entities© & ¨ ™ ¡ £& < > ¥ € ® ± ¶ § ¦ ¯ « · X² Y³ ¾ ¼ × ÷ » 18ºC " ' ##Escaping for Special Characters *literal asterisks* Markdown extrasGFM task list GFM task list 1 GFM task list 2 GFM task list 3 GFM task list 3-1 GFM task list 3-2 GFM task list 3-3 GFM task list 4 GFM task list 4-1 GFM task list 4-2 Emoji mixed :smiley: Blockquotes :star: GFM task lists & Emoji & fontAwesome icon emoji & editormd logo emoji :editormd-logo-5x: :smiley: @mentions, :smiley: #refs, links, formatting, and tags supported :editormd-logo:; list syntax required (any unordered or ordered list supported) :editormd-logo-3x:; [ ] :smiley: this is a complete item :smiley:; []this is an incomplete item test link :fa-star: @pandao; [ ]this is an incomplete item :fa-star: :fa-gear:; :smiley: this is an incomplete item test link :fa-star: :fa-gear:; :smiley: this is :fa-star: :fa-gear: an incomplete item test link; TeX(LaTeX)$$E=mc^2$$ Inline $$E=mc^2$$ Inline，Inline $$E=mc^2$$ Inline。 $$(\sqrt{3x-1}+(1+x)^2)$$ $$\sin(\alpha)^{\theta}=\sum_{i=0}^{n}(x^i + \cos(f))$$ FlowChart12345678st=>start: Loginop=>operation: Login operationcond=>condition: Successful Yes or No?e=>end: To adminst->op->condcond(yes)->econd(no)->op Sequence Diagram1234Andrew->China: Says Hello Note right of China: China thinks\nabout it China-->Andrew: How are you? Andrew->>China: I am good thanks! End
